Pre-Game Insights: Phil Salt will step up as captain due to Jos Buttler's hamstring injury.
This series against Australia could be key to determining who stays in the mix for the England white-ball team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The final and potentially deciding match of the ODI series will take place at Gloucestershire's Seat Unique Stadium in Bristol.
Gloucestershire will host a 'hybrid pitch walkthrough' to counteract claims about their surface not being up to hosting internationals.
Others: England underperformed at the T20 World Cup earlier this year and last year they flopped when defending their ODI World Cup, so all eyes are on whether the side have made drastic improvements.
Brendon McCullum will expand his role to the two white-ball formats from January, replacing Marcus Trescothick as coach.
